unnormalised: Advocate Sharma said in court that the divorce petition was filed u/s 13 of the Hindu Marriage Act and the next hearing is on 22/12/2024. Hope Aisha wins her case!
normalised: Advocate Sharma said in court that the divorce petition was filed under section thirteen of the Hindu Marriage Act and the next hearing is on twenty second December two thousand and twenty four. Hope Aisha wins her case!
